Instructions.To contribute, go to the \"data\" sheet: Adding someone requires their Semantic Scholar ID. To find their Semantic Scholar id, find the person at https://www.semanticscholar.org/, go to their author page (e.g., https://www.semanticscholar.org/author/Michael-S-Bernstein/3047089), and copy-paste the ID from the end of the URL: https://www.semanticscholar.org/author/their-name/1234567 would be "1234567". The Semantic Scholar dataset is current through February 2017.
